cause.description:
The world is falling apart and we are given front row seats to the destruction. This is our chance to make a difference in the world we live in and fight against war and hatred and WAGE PEACE. Make love, not war!! I'm challenging all of you to go against the current and stop the violence. Peace. Not War.
1. Protest against war and violence
2. Make a better world for us and our generation
cause.mission: Stop war, hatred, bigotry, and promote peace to make a better world for us and our generation.
cause.name: Movement Away From Agression
